TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract AutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public MustInherit Class AutomationPeer Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 提供一个可将元素公开给 UI 自动化的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class that exposes an element to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]查询的根[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]有关元素的应用程序，根返回[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]该元素的对等方。When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element. 对等方还能够响应[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]有关其对应的元素的查询。The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在由派生类的构造函数调用时，它们可对基类值进行初始化。

span.span: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

The that is the source of events.

span.span: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将由 调用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序响应键盘事件来提供快捷方式键行为，它应返回一个字符串，包含的键盘快捷方式组合。If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination. 例如，可以将文本复制到剪贴板的元素，此附加的属性可能设置为"CTRL + C"的值。For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetAccessKey() cil managed

summary.span: 获取与自动化对等关联的元素的访问密钥。

span.span: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.

returns.span: 包含访问密钥的字符串。

span.span: The string that contains the access key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAccessKeyCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetAccessKeyCore () As String

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将由 调用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .

returns.span: 包含访问密钥的字符串。

span.span: The string that contains the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks （有时称为键盘快捷方式或助记键） 的访问密钥是中的菜单、 菜单项或如调用关联的菜单函数的按钮控件的标签文本的字符。An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function. 例如，若要提供的快捷方式打开`File`菜单 （适用于访问密钥通常是 F），元素可能已将此附加的属性设置为"ALT + F"。For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".

summary.span: 告知 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 树中何处放置由 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 元素托管的 。

span.span: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] element.

returns.span: 此方法会将托管的 返回到托管 对象的控件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

span.span: This method returns the hosted to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将托管的 `hwnd` 返回到托管 `hwnd` 对象的控件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects. 直接承载的元素与该键相关联`hwnd`必须重写此方法。The that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method. 如果未重写此方法，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]放置`hwnd`作为子元素的承载整个应用程序。If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the that hosts the whole application. 通常情况下，你想要覆盖此默认行为，并设置[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]定位承载`hwnd`平行于它所在的位置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]逻辑树。Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] logical tree. 除非在托管方案，不允许类型重写此方法。Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow types to override this method. 重写此方法，除了直接承载的元素与关联的类型`hwnd`必须返回转换为托管WM_GETOBJECT响应`hwnd`.In addition to overriding this method, the types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the that is cast to in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`. 若要获取一个指向，调用。To get a pointer to , call .

summary.span: 获取以元素为目标的 的 。

span.span: Gets the for the that is targeted to the element.
The for the element that is targeted by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，如果该元素是控件，方法获取有关关联。For example, if the element is a control, the method gets the for the that is associated with the . 在下图中， "主题"针对; 因此有关还针对。In the following image, the "Themes" is targeted to the ; therefore the for the also targets the . 当用户按**ALT**+**T**，则获得焦点而不是。When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the gets focus instead of the . ![显示属性显示按用法标记](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "显示属性显示按用法标记")![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage") 方法返回相应。The method for returns the for the corresponding . 这使自动化客户端以获取说明的文本字符串。This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the .

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetNameCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetNameCore () As String

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将由 调用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is called by .
The string that contains the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将此值作为用户用来解释它们引用的控件的字符串。You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to. 讲述人等工具使用此属性告诉用户控件是什么。This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is. 例如，使用字符串"确定"按钮应返回"确定"。For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK". 一个使用户可以选择一种颜色的控件可能会返回"颜色"。A control that lets users select a color might return "Colors". 请确保你已为中的所有控件分配了名称[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]，以便可访问性工具，如屏幕阅读器可以本地化的方式引用每个控件。Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidatePeer() cil managed

summary.span: 触发对 主要属性的重新计算，如果属性已更改，则引发对自动化客户端的 通知。

span.span: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the and raises the notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要属性示例包括，但不限于和。Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, and . 通常情况下，更新和通知会自动发生在布局更新后[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]。Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]. (在响应中发生更新事件。)有时，但是，属性更改不会生成事件。(The update occurs in response to the event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the event. 例如，当整个移动，不会引发事件。For example, when the whole moves, the event is not raised. 在此示例中的一套对象更改，因为以屏幕坐标表示的对象。In this example, the set of objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates. 因此，必须调用上的同级。Therefore, the must call on its peer on .

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsContentElement() cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与此自动化对等方关联的元素是否包含向用户显示的数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.

returns.span: 如果元素为内容元素，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is a content element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容元素包含向用户显示的数据。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 内容元素的一个示例是一个列表框中的项或在对话框中的按钮。An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box. 通常可以使用非内容元素 （这也称为外围元素） 来处理在复合控件中的内容。You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control. 非内容元素的一个示例是一个下拉列表控件中的按钮。An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.

related.span: 服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序实现

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsOffscreen() cil managed

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示元素是否不在屏幕上。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether an element is off the screen.

returns.span: 如果元素不在屏幕上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不指示元素是否可见。This property does not indicate whether the element is visible. 在某些情况下，元素在屏幕上，但仍然不可见。In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible. 例如，如果该元素为但模糊的其他元素在屏幕上，它可能不会显示。For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible. 在这种情况下，该方法返回`false`。In this case, the method returns `false`.

Public Shared Function ListenerExists (eventId As AutomationEvents) As Boolean

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]是否正在侦听指定的事件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.

returns.span: 指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]是否正在侦听事件的 。

span.span: A that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，在创建之前调用此方法引发事件。Typically, you call this method before creating the that raises the event. 此方法是性能度量值，因为如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不会侦听事件，不值得创建对等方引发一个。This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one. > [!NOTE] > 此方法是静态的并仅回答了如果委托中的指定事件在侦听[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]，而不适用于特定元素上的事件。This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 可以创建广播的侦听器;因此，每个元素的信息是不相关。 can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
